name: Fitterfly
description: Fitterfly is a health tech start-up specialising in Digital Therapeutics (DTx) & is founded & run by a team of Doctors, Engineers & Senior Nutritionists. Our DTx programs combine human & technological interventions to cater to every patient's specific needs to improve outcomes. Fitterfly's current product suite includes scientific & hyper-personalised DTx programs for prediabetes, diabetes & obesity. Designed to be an add-on to the Doctor's medical therapy, our DTx programs offer 360° guidance around nutrition, exercise and mental well-being. We improve patient outcomes through behavioural change, which is done by the collaborative efforts of a team of Coaches who are at the forefront of every program. Every team has a Nutritionist with an M.Sc in dietetics, a qualified Physiotherapist and an RCI-certified Clinical Psychologist. Together, we push the patient towards healthier habits using the 'Nudge Theory'.

Highlights.name: Personalized Programs for Weight Management and Disease Reversal
Highlights.description: Fitterfly offers personalized programs to help people manage their weight and reverse chronic conditions like diabetes and heart disease [1]. These programs are based on scientific research and are designed to help people make sustainable lifestyle changes.

Highlights.name: Mobile App with Coaching, Meal Plans, and Education
Highlights.description: Fitterfly's programs are delivered through a mobile app that provides users with access to a variety of features, including consultations with coaches, personalized meal plans, and educational modules [1]. This comprehensive approach can help users to stay motivated and on track with their goals.

Highlights.name: Scientifically-Backed Approach to Health Improvement
Highlights.description: Fitterfly's programs are based on scientific research, which means that they are effective and evidence-based [1]. This can give users confidence that they are on the right track to improving their health.

enhanced_description: Fitterfly is a health tech start-up specializing in Digital Therapeutics (DTx), founded and run by a multidisciplinary team of Doctors, Engineers, and Senior Nutritionists. It offers scientific, hyper-personalized DTx programs for prediabetes, diabetes, and obesity, designed as an add-on to a doctor's medical therapy. These programs provide 360-degree guidance on nutrition, exercise, and mental well-being, with the core aim of improving patient outcomes through behavioral change using the 'Nudge Theory'. Programs are delivered via a mobile app, providing users with consultations with a team of coaches (Nutritionists, Physiotherapists, and RCI-certified Clinical Psychologists), personalized meal plans, and educational modules. Fitterfly's approach is scientifically-backed, focusing on empowering individuals to achieve and maintain health, specifically through weight management and chronic condition reversal. It supports corporate objectives related to improving employee happiness and engagement, positioning itself as a provider of total rewards and health & safety solutions.
